name: Alabaster, the wizard
text: Ah, greetings, traveler! Welcome to our humble village on the isle of Telmaron. I am Alabaster, the wizard, purveyor of knowledge and the whimsy of magic. How may I assist you on this fine and fateful day? Remember, in every shadow, there lies a shimmering hint of light, just waiting to be discovered!

name: Alabaster, the wizard
text: Ah, once more a soul seeks refuge in our quaint village! Welcome indeed. I am Alabaster, and if you ever seek the secrets of magic or the gentle whispers of wisdom, do not hesitate to ask. Here in Telmaron, even the stones hum with enchantment, and mayhaps, you'll find your own melody amongst us. What knowledge or guidance do you seek, dear traveler?
